thread.title: How a six-figure deal from the 1960s blocked clean-up of radiotoxic site
thread.title_full: How a six-figure deal from the 1960s blocked clean-up of radiotoxic site - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: How a six-figure deal from the 1960s blocked clean-up of radiotoxic site
text: One hundred and twenty-six thousand dollars. That's how much money was offered by Contemporary Metals Corporation in 1962 to acquire all the contents of the world's first nuclear waste dump. It may seem unbelievable and incredibly reckless
